<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A fixed point semantic fits in a floating point semantic if the maximum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and minimum values as integers of the fixed point semantic can fit in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// floating point semantic.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If these values do not fit, then a floating point rescaling of the true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// maximum/minimum value will not fit either, so the floating point semantic</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cannot be used to perform such a rescaling.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CommonLsb = std::min(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#aaea346c0aab9c7f4608ce41a4c217fa5">getLsbWeight</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.getLsbWeight());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CommonMSb = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a232037d122854fa07a16938f469c8921">getMsbWeight</a>() - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#acf36b3741d49fd77bfca7057fb8e2f3f">hasSignOrPaddingBit</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">                           <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.getMsbWeight() - <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.hasSignOrPaddingBit());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CommonWidth = CommonMSb - CommonLsb + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResultIsSigned = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a05ad0838e692b5cdc021f49da8343187">isSigned</a>() || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.isSigned();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResultIsSaturated = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a56da39babaf07b5638145d232de64949">isSaturated</a>() || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.isSaturated();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResultHasUnsignedPadding = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ResultIsSigned) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Both are unsigned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">    ResultHasUnsignedPadding = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a516540ad4950d71de2266507041b9c6e">hasUnsignedPadding</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">                               <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.hasUnsignedPadding() &amp;&amp; !ResultIsSaturated;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the result is signed, add an extra bit for the sign. Otherwise, if it is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unsigned and has unsigned padding, we only need to add the extra padding</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bit back if we are not saturating.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ResultIsSigned || ResultHasUnsignedPadding)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">    CommonWidth++;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Widen the LHS and RHS so we can perform a full multiplication.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Wide = CommonFXSema.getWidth() &#42; 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Perform the full multiplication and downscale to get the same scale.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that the right shifts here perform an implicit downwards rounding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This rounding could discard bits that would technically place the result</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// outside the representable range. We interpret the spec as allowing us to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// perform the rounding step first, avoiding the overflow case that would</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// arise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apsint">APSInt</a> Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CommonFXSema.isSigned())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">    Result = ThisVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ac155d7c568fc1aba25723e77b6888908">smul&#95;ov</a>(OtherVal, Overflowed)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">                 .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a793e27a4e7b6ec5ecab8e7616e0d4ac0">relativeAShl</a>(CommonFXSema.getLsbWeight());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal">    Result = ThisVal.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a028f4d1eead63cc33499ce3459bd27c7">umul&#95;ov</a>(OtherVal, Overflowed)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Overflowed &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Full multiplication cannot overflow!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">  Result.setIsSigned(CommonFXSema.isSigned());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If our result lies outside of the representative range of the common</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// semantic, we either have overflow or saturation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apsint">APSInt</a> Max = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#ae7ca9ff56521cc2e2c51d96ad9a6005c">APFixedPoint::getMax</a>(CommonFXSema).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a82cc2364c94c614756f6013fd3fb902a">getValue</a>()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                 .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apsint/#a0080c63e713e9ead5c33929b9127e96f">extOrTrunc</a>(Wide);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apsint">APSInt</a> Min = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a1c4398afd568f2c31f81dcecad35ef7b">APFixedPoint::getMin</a>(CommonFXSema).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a82cc2364c94c614756f6013fd3fb902a">getValue</a>()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                 .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apsint/#a0080c63e713e9ead5c33929b9127e96f">extOrTrunc</a>(Wide);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CommonFXSema.isSaturated()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Result &lt; Min)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result = Min;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Result &gt; Max)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result = Max;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal">    Overflowed = Result &lt; Min || Result &gt; Max;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Overflow)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;Overflow = Overflowed;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a17de6476b95be00e26e2a67b4bdd105f">APFixedPoint</a>(Result.sextOrTrunc(CommonFXSema.getWidth()),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">                      CommonFXSema);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Width = std::max(OrigWidth, Scale) + 4;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For some operations, rounding mode has an effect on the result, while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// other operations are lossless and should never result in rounding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To signify which these operations are, we define two rounding modes here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a1ea536c95c40fca11948b01252554b2a">APFloat::roundingMode</a> RM = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a22ed74f1ed33c4d33f524a650ea536a6">APFloat::rmNearestTiesToEven</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a1ea536c95c40fca11948b01252554b2a">APFloat::roundingMode</a> LosslessRM = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a482d9cf95b588eb05cefeaa5c05be9a3">APFloat::rmTowardZero</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure that we are operating in a type that works with this fixed-point</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// semantic.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fltsemantics">fltSemantics</a> &#42;OpSema = &amp;FloatSema;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Sema.fitsInFloatSemantics(&#42;OpSema))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal">    OpSema = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#aca508af3c3b25de78d97741420a9ff9e">promoteFloatSemantics</a>(OpSema);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Convert the fixed point value bits as an integer. If the floating point</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value does not have the required precision, we will round according to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// given mode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11534cddb9d36ce7b049eefacc295a96">Flt</a>(&#42;OpSema);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#aee544c332088dbef348a0c1c97e21a6a">APFloat::opStatus</a> S = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11534cddb9d36ce7b049eefacc295a96">Flt</a>.convertFromAPInt(Val, Sema.isSigned(), RM);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we cared about checking for precision loss, we could look at this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// status.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">  (void)S;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Scale down the integer value in the float to match the correct scaling</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// factor.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> ScaleFactor(std::pow(2, Sema.getLsbWeight()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ignored;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a67272093577b2c99e6138e38c647abe3"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a67272093577b2c99e6138e38c647abe3">APFixedPoint::getFromFloatValue</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics">FixedPointSemantics</a> &amp;DstFXSema,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Overflow) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For some operations, rounding mode has an effect on the result, while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// other operations are lossless and should never result in rounding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To signify which these operations are, we define two rounding modes here,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// even though they are the same mode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a1ea536c95c40fca11948b01252554b2a">APFloat::roundingMode</a> RM = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a482d9cf95b588eb05cefeaa5c05be9a3">APFloat::rmTowardZero</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a1ea536c95c40fca11948b01252554b2a">APFloat::roundingMode</a> LosslessRM = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/apfloatbase/#a482d9cf95b588eb05cefeaa5c05be9a3">APFloat::rmTowardZero</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fltsemantics">fltSemantics</a> &amp;FloatSema = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>.getSemantics();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>.isNaN()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Handle NaN immediately.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Overflow)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#42;Overflow = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a17de6476b95be00e26e2a67b4bdd105f">APFixedPoint</a>(DstFXSema);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure that we are operating in a type that works with this fixed-point</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// semantic.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/fltsemantics">fltSemantics</a> &#42;OpSema = &amp;FloatSema;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DstFXSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#ab30aaf95486d0b2aac87f3d9e1e450e3">fitsInFloatSemantics</a>(&#42;OpSema))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">    OpSema = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#aca508af3c3b25de78d97741420a9ff9e">promoteFloatSemantics</a>(OpSema);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> Val = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ignored;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&amp;FloatSema != OpSema)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">    Val.convert(&#42;OpSema, LosslessRM, &amp;Ignored);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Scale up the float so that the &#39;fractional&#39; part of the mantissa ends up in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the integer range instead. Rounding mode is irrelevant here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It is fine if this overflows to infinity even for saturating types,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// since we will use floating point comparisons to check for saturation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> ScaleFactor(std::pow(2, -DstFXSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#aaea346c0aab9c7f4608ce41a4c217fa5">getLsbWeight</a>()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">  ScaleFactor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat/#a257e3cb529defa79ad7a9f42072f339a">convert</a>(&#42;OpSema, LosslessRM, &amp;Ignored);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">  Val.multiply(ScaleFactor, LosslessRM);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Convert to the integral representation of the value. This rounding mode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is significant.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apsint">APSInt</a> Res(DstFXSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a2f3dab29dd773a1faa002a701261db99">getWidth</a>(), !DstFXSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a05ad0838e692b5cdc021f49da8343187">isSigned</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal">  Val.convertToInteger(Res, RM, &amp;Ignored);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Round the integral value and scale back. This makes the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// overflow calculations below work properly. If we do not round here,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we risk checking for overflow with a value that is outside the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// representable range of the fixed-point semantic even though no overflow</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// would occur had we rounded first.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">  ScaleFactor = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a>(std::pow(2, DstFXSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#aaea346c0aab9c7f4608ce41a4c217fa5">getLsbWeight</a>()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">  ScaleFactor.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat/#a257e3cb529defa79ad7a9f42072f339a">convert</a>(&#42;OpSema, LosslessRM, &amp;Ignored);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">  Val.roundToIntegral(RM);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">  Val.multiply(ScaleFactor, LosslessRM);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check for overflow/saturation by checking if the floating point value</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is outside the range representable by the fixed-point value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> FloatMax = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#ae7ca9ff56521cc2e2c51d96ad9a6005c">getMax</a>(DstFXSema).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a6f50fded9ec4a127a18b88ef2a61163e">convertToFloat</a>(&#42;OpSema);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> FloatMin = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a1c4398afd568f2c31f81dcecad35ef7b">getMin</a>(DstFXSema).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a6f50fded9ec4a127a18b88ef2a61163e">convertToFloat</a>(&#42;OpSema);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Overflowed = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DstFXSema.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedpointsemantics/#a56da39babaf07b5638145d232de64949">isSaturated</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Val &gt; FloatMax)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">      Res = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#ae7ca9ff56521cc2e2c51d96ad9a6005c">getMax</a>(DstFXSema).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a82cc2364c94c614756f6013fd3fb902a">getValue</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Val &lt; FloatMin)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal">      Res = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a1c4398afd568f2c31f81dcecad35ef7b">getMin</a>(DstFXSema).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a82cc2364c94c614756f6013fd3fb902a">getValue</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="normal">    Overflowed = Val &gt; FloatMax || Val &lt; FloatMin;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Overflow)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;Overflow = Overflowed;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfixedpoint/#a17de6476b95be00e26e2a67b4bdd105f">APFixedPoint</a>(Res, DstFXSema);</Highlight></CodeLine>
